data.title: Pub like atmosphere with great food choices
data.text:
Several times we have gone by Brewzzi and like the appearance of the outside patio and yesterday we stop by for a n early dinner .  Their menu is extensive for hand held meals and the selection of tasty brew burgers and sandwich creations caught our attention. 
I had the the Brewhouse burger.  This burger was loaded with onions , peppers, cheddar cheese, and it was melted, with lettuce. Easy as "all get out. " Our other selection was Pollo Venezia , juicy chicken breast ,monterrey jack cheese, , mushrooms and some spinach.   
Service was excellent and being on the patio added to the enjoyment.  I am not a beer drinker but those who are would enjoy the many choices to pick from. 
We highly recommend Brewzzi .

data.title: Huge Portions, Great Atmosphere, Fabulous Bar and Patio area, Consistent Food
data.text: Try the Chicken Parm Sandwich which is as good as any in Little Italy or the North End of Boston. Huge Portions food always good and great service. Intimate atmosphere good for privacy in their booths or for groups at the bar or patio area where there is always festive chatter and socializing goings on.

data.title: Very good lunch specials
data.text:
A few of us came here for a weekday business lunch.
The options for the lunch specials all seemed great.
We had different items and we all enjoyed them. Service was a bit slow. I guess this is ok if you are relaxing with some of their many beer choices during the afternoon.
A return visit for dinner to check out other menu items or beers may occur in the future.

data.title: Excellent food and drink
data.text: We are from Ohio and come to Pompano Beach every year. We heard about this place while visiting a brewery in Pompano. Wow! This place is amazing. We only stopped for the beer selection but stayed for dinner because everything looked so good. You must try the crap dip! It is absolutely the best I've ever had. I also had the crab cakes and they are just as wonderful. The service was fantastic and Everyone in the place was friendly and helpful. You must stop if you are in Boca! We will definitely be back while in town.

data.title: Great Service
data.text: Had dinner here last evening.  Our server, Paige was delightful.  She was pleasant, efficient (without being intrusive) and extremely knowledgeable about all aspects of the menu.  The interior is inviting and the bar area is a great place for a drink while waiting for your table.  The restaurant was freezing and caused the food to get cold before we finished.  I would recommend that if you decide to go to Brewzzi's, that you take a jacket.  You will definitely need one.  The only other negative is the noise level if you are seated near the food prep area.

data.title: Excellent food and beer
data.text: I read on Tripadvisor that this place had the best burgers in Boca Raton so I tried it.  I ended up have a chicken parm sandwich instead, which was outstanding -- big and delicious.  I also tried the black bean soup which was one of the best I've ever had.  They also have a selection of their own beers; the specialty is a blonde ale which was very nice.  It's located not far from I-95, near a large mall.  Definitely worth trying if you're in the area.

data.title: Food was good...service lackluster.
data.text: We stopped in for lunch. Not very busy and we sat on the porch. The beer was good and my sunny side burger and the wife's chicken wrap were great. The server Rio however, was lackluster at best. We got our own ketchup and waited forever to get a drink refill. He seemed like he would rather be anywhere else than there. Too bad as the food and beer were pretty good.

data.title: good food, large portions
data.text: we were 4 people and each enjoyed our dinners. salads are large and a great variety .my wife had the seared salmon which was very tasty and my cousin had a huge burger with onion strings. service was very good.

data.title: A lot, a lot
data.text: The restaurant is next to a small brewery. We had chicken wings and a cup of chowder to start with. The chicken wings were a entree considering the amout. As entree a brewhouse burger and ribeye. The side with the ribeye was too much for me. Maybe better to serve the half of it and tell that you can have additional for free. After ordering the dessert it came with the cheque. For me, from Europe, a bit strange. It gives the feeling that you should leave and cannot sit for another 15 minutes or so.

data.title: Nice service, and fair food
data.text:
I met with a friend in this location, service was very pleasant and acomodating, we wanted a quieter area to chat, I had a pizza, very nicely done, think and nice crust, and my friend had a salad with chicken on it.

In a nutshell, it is a good place to have lunch, at decent prices.

data.title: Excellent Food and Service
data.text: First time here, and I was impressed! First of all, we had a great waiter -- Milo (friendly, patient, and cheerful). I ordered from the luncheon $10 menu [2 meatloaf sliders (quite high and comes with one side . . . I ordered the gorgonzola mashed cauliflower) and a soft drink (I had passion fruit iced tea)].  $10 people!!! I will definitely be back and bring friends. Why didn't I know this place was so good till now?

data.title: Great Food . Nice Location
data.text: I went there to visit a friend who recommended this place . Very nice Atmosphere to eat or drink outdoors or inside. Its a Brewery too so they make different favors of beer. The portions of food are very good and reasonable price for that location. Staff very friendly and helpful since it was my first time there

data.title: Love their nachos
data.text: We love coming in with friends so we can order the nachos appetizer. It's enough for 4-6 people and quite tasty.   Then we all share the entree.   We come here at least 3 times a month and have never had a bad experience.

data.title: Salads & Tachos
data.text: The salads are large and well made but they're heading towards the pricey side. Sisterinlaw enjoyed chicken tacos. Both salad and tacos presented well. Service has always been a plus here and the ambiance is always enjoyable. Craft brew was enjoyable but serving could be be larger.

data.title: Ok Lunch
data.text:
Went to check out the 10 dollar menu. Instead ordered the 16 dollar chicken parm sandwich and fries. This always seems to be my go to meal when I am there. It is good and very filling. My friend had the Chicken Quesadilla. Says she would have preferred more chicken in the meal and less peppers and onions. 
Service was very slow. The guy thought we were there to hang out. When he disappeared he disappeared. We had to flag him down after waiting 10 minutes to stop by and take our drink order. Also it took a long time for the food and the restaurant was not busy. I will go back only after I have exhausted the other restaurants in the area. This is sad as Brewzzi use to be a good place to go to.

data.title: Very good
data.text:
Always reliable. Good food, reasonable prices and good service. In house brewed beer is very good. The menu has a big selection. There should be something on it to suit almost anyone. 
There are Groupons available frequently and if you don't have a Groupon, they give a 10% discount to AAA members.

data.title: sERVICE AND FOOD WERE GREAT
data.text: the services and food were excellent as well as their specialty brewed beers.  The waiter was always there whenever we needed him with service with a smile.

data.title: Fast Food Served!
data.text: Food was good, but nothing unusual.  The restaurant is clean and the service was good.  The menu is burgers, salads, italian dishes, and chicken, along with the usual diner fare.  Portions are huge!  Seating is booths that are one on top of the other, but for the price it is fine.

data.title: Excellent craft beer AND excellent food
data.text:
We went to Brewzzi's because it was listed as a craft brewery. When we arrived we discovered it was also a full service restaurant. Win. Win.

First the beer. The have a nice selection focused on traditional German lagers. I had a City Fest, a Vienna lager, and my wife had a Boca Blonde, their traditional German Munich Helles Lager. Both were excellent representations of their styles.

For food I ordered the 10 in personal pizza with mushrooms, meatball slices and pepperoni. I loved it! My wife ordered the chicken tenders and to quote her "These are the best chicken tenders I have ever eaten". I had one, they were delicious!

They have menu other food items and other craft beers to choose from. On our next visit to Boca Raton we plan to return.

data.title: Great burger and fries
data.text: A friend and I visited here with our fingers crossed. I had a cheese burger, and my friend had a turkey burger. Both of our sandwiches were excellent, and we were both pleasantly suprised to get fresh from the fryer fries, that does not happen often for me.  Crinkle cut sweet potato fries are delicious here, as well as the regular fries. Service was very good I will not hesitate to return. I want to go back to try the fried calamari.
